name: portland raglan dog sweater
notes:
**description**
the portland raglan dog sweater is worked from neck to tail using a raglan construction and features a folded neckband and harness hole .  this sweaterâ€™s classic design makes it a great go-to sweater that can be adapted to fit a variety of shapes and styles. 

this sweater comes in six sizes.

**video tutorial**
you can also find a video tutorial for this sweater on my youtube channel: https://youtu.be/pqabxpnjf-w 

**yarn**
any light worsted/dk weight yarn.

sandnes garn perfect in gris moyen (1042), cascade yarns 220 superwash in shire (1918), and sandes garn duo in deep red (4236) shown in pictures.

**needles**
for sizes xxs, xs, s:
circular needles: 4.5 mm (us7) 30 cm (12 inches) & 4 mm (us6) 23 cm (9 inches) 

for sizes m, l, xl:
circular needles: 4.5 mm (us7) 40 cm (16 inches) & 4 mm (us6) 30 cm (12 inches)

alternatively, you can use 4.5 mm (us7) & 4 mm (us6) double-pointed needles or 4.5 mm (us7) & 4 mm (us6) circular needles with a long cable for the magic loop method.

if you prefer a raglan dog sweater without sleeves, check out the [edinburgh seamless dog sweater][1]. 


  [1]: https://ravel.me/edinburgh-seamless-dog-sweater
